text:
Cornerstone.co.uk | Back end Software Engineers | London | Full Time | Onsite | https://www.cornerstone.co.uk/

We're the UK's largest grooming subscription service. With over 170k members getting our products on a regular basis, there's a lot to do. We're looking for a back end engineer to join the team and provide the best experience for our members.

- We write well tested code using Laravel.

- In-depth database knowledge a bonus (currently using MySQL)

- Beards allowed.

Apply by emailing engineering@cornerstone.co.uk
